title: Accuracy is all you need
event_description: Accuracy is All You Need is a competitive machine learning challenge where participants must build the most accurate predictive model on a given dataset. The event emphasizes real-world data handling, model training, and performance optimization under constraints.

title: Simply Automation
event_description: Simply Automation is a hands-on, open-innovation event where participants design and implement automation workflows that solve real-world problems. Each team will build an automation prototype using any platform or technology of their choice. The event focuses on innovation, practicality, and real-world applicability of automation systems. Participants can use Python scripts, UiPath, Automation Anywhere, n8n, MCPs, custom agents, Zapier, Power Automate, or any equivalent tools. The main objective is to encourage creative thinking and technical execution that demonstrates automation’s potential to simplify or optimize real processes.

title: Figma Clash
event_description: This designathon isn’t just about “designing an app” — it’s about solving real problems through empathy and creativity. It challenges you to think like a user, identify pain points, tackle minute usability issues, and craft seamless experiences that truly make sense. Get your creative hats on and show how well you can turn insight into impact!

title: RADIANT CLASH: VALORANT SHOWDOWN
event_description: Gear up, Agents! Anokhya presents the ultimate test of skill, strategy, and teamwork. Assemble your squad and battle through intense online qualifiers for a shot at glory. The top 8 teams will advance to a high-stakes, offline showdown on campus to prove their mettle. Only the most elite team will defuse the competition and claim the title of champion.

title: AirCrash – The Ultimate Roleplay Showdown
event_description: Step aboard the wildest flight simulation ever — AirCrash! Each participant takes on a unique personality aboard a crashing plane, with only two parachutes left. Your mission? Convince the pilot (judge) that you deserve one! It’s not just about what you say — it’s how creatively, confidently, and convincingly you stay in character that counts. Let the drama unfold, the laughter roll, and may the best passenger survive the crash!

title: Free Fire
event_description: Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled Free Fire Clash Squad Tournament where only the best survive! Sixteen teams enter the battlefield — but only one will walk away as the Ultimate Champion. Show your aim, strategy, and teamwork to dominate every round and claim victory!

title: Treasure Hunt
event_description: Embark on a thrilling adventure across campus! Anokhya presents Treasure Trail: The Hidden Quest, a fully offline treasure hunt that will test your wit, teamwork, and determination. Solve clever riddles, follow cryptic clues, and complete exciting challenges scattered around the campus. Only the most resourceful and united team will uncover the final treasure and claim victory!
